classification.task_goal: Translate English text to Arabic using a BiGRU encoder and BiLSTM decoder.
primary_constraints: Split data into train, validate, and test sets.
Tokenize the sentences and convert them into numerical representations.
Pad or truncate the sentences to a fixed length.
Use test data to evaluate and provide an example translation.
classification.reasoning: The AI initially provided code that did not read data from a file as specified by the user. The user later reiterated the requirement, prompting the AI to correct the code to include file reading functionality, thus repairing the constraint violation.
